name: Puzzles 4 in 1
description:
Four puzzle in one game. Number Puzzle, Image Slide , Jigsaw, Triple Match

Description
Welcome to the fun world of puzzles. Challenge your logical thinking with our puzzle games. A great way to distract yourself from everyday problems and have fun with the four games we have combined for you in one application.

First game: 
Number Slide Puzzle 15 - Familiar game for many years, relevant to this day. The goal of the game is to arrange the numbers in order.

Second game:
Image Slide Puzzle - This is a game for people who love the challenge. By dragging parts of the photo, you should be able to assemble the whole picture. You have three bonus buttons with which you can see the whole picture in two seconds during the game.

Third Game:
Jigsaw Puzzles - A classic game in which you have to  arrange the whole picture by moving the individual pieces with each other.

Fourth game:
Triple Match - It’s a challenging matching game where you have to arrange the pull equal three by three to pass the level. After each level the species increases. We have prepared more surprises for you, but we will leave you to discover them for yourself.

Challenge your brain with Softbring's game Puzzles 4 in 1
